unnormalised: Mumbai-ant zageanchi kimot matyeak tenkona ravta, lokanno! Bandra-nt eka 1BHK-chi listing viral zali – fakt 350 sq ft ani taka ₹3.5 crore kimot. Ho, tumi sarkench vachlam, lokanno. Titlench paisank tumi sonvsarantlean khanchi-i bhagant ek lhan bet gheunk xakta.
normalised: Mumbaiantlea gharaanche kimati matyek lagnaat na, lokanno! Bandrant ek B-H-K gharachi jaheerat zaali ani ti viral zali – fakt teenso panchas feet ani kimat kitli aslyar? Tor teen point paanch crore rupya. Ho, tumi barobar vachlam, lokanno. Itlya paishent tumka duniyaat kiteak tori ek dhakto bet gheunk mellto.

unnormalised: "Doria-mukhi" mhonnche tumi *kiteak-i* doria polleunk xakta tumi apno doria-mukhar nirdharponnani lean zanvche ani eka velak chaicho kop sambalche. Ani "suvidha"? Tho, 60% vel kamak yetai ashi lift ani Raju namacho watchman asa taka soglle ut'tom gossipaichi mahiti asa.
normalised: "Dorya-mukhi" mhunllear tumka *shakya* asa tumi dorya disunk shaktai zali tumi aplea bajuklean bhair jhunkun ek chaiacho cup sambhalltai. Ani "suvidha"? Mhunnllear, ek lift asa ji sadharan saat percent vellaak kaam karta ani ek watchman asa zache nanv Raju asa ani taka soglle porjek khobri mahit asa.

unnormalised: Real estate agent he "investichi sandhi" mhonn korun sangtai. Konnak investichi sandhi asa, sarkheponnani? Fuddarachi pidhyonk tanka vorsuki malmatacho kar bharpacheak tankanchi vikri korchi podtali. Eko broker, apnnak "RealEstateGuru420" online mhonnun vakhanan, sangata ki he ek chorak asa, Monaco-che kimot per sq ft-nak tulna korun, tennka pura karnyak dukavto, Monaco, Monaco asa mhonnun.
normalised: Real estate agents hem "investment potential" mhunnon sangtat. Investment potential konnakhatir, exact? Fuddlya pidhyank zanka aplea kidney vikunk podtle annual property tax afford korunk. Ek broker, apun "R-e-a-l-E-s-t-a-t-e-G-u-r-u four hundred and twenty" online mhunnon sangta, mhunno ki hem chori assa, ani Monaco-chea price per square foot-kodde tulna karta, ani taka bilkul mahit na ki Monaco, Monaco mhunnllear Monaco asa.

unnormalised: Mhozo auto-rickshaw cholovpi, Ramu kaka, ut'tom sangtalo: "Itna paisa mein toh main pura gaon kharid lega, beta!" (Titlench paisank, hanv eka ganv gheunk xakta, putra!). To "gramin malmatanchi sandhi" mhonnun ek spardhak agency survat korcheak vichar korta. "RealEstateGuru420" zatreponnachek zayo!
normalised: Muzo auto-rickshaw choloiche Ramu kaka, sogle boro sanglo: "Itna paisa mein toh main pura gaon kharid lega, beta!" (Itlya paishent mhunje hanv ek pura ganv gheta, bhurgea!). To ek dusri agency suru korchea visar asa ji "rural real estate opportunities" specialista assa. Hushar rav, "R-e-a-l-E-s-t-a-t-e-G-u-r-u four hundred and twenty"!

unnormalised: Tumi Mumbai-che skyline-che ek bhag gheunk asat zalear, tumi atanchek sanchay korunk survat kara. Ya Ramu kaka-chi ganvachi suvidha vicharat gheta. Hanv fakta sangtam.
normalised: Tumi Mumbai-chea akashaacho ek tukdo gheunchea sapne dekhtai, zalear atanch samballunk suru kor. Va Ramu kaka-chea ganvanche vichar kar. Fakt sangta.
